content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. What is your name so I can assist you further?
Hi Ava! My name is Mary Jensen.
Nice to meet you, Mary! Can you please provide your address so I can confirm we serve your area?
Thank you! What type of service do you need today? Is it plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
It's electrical. I just moved here and the outlets in my living room don’t work. Could I get a price estimate before we book?
I’d be happy to get you a price estimate for your electrical issue. One moment while I retrieve that information.
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble retrieving a price estimate right now. Let me connect you with one of our specialists who can help with this.

Hi Mary, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the wait! Regarding your electrical issue, we usually need an in-person assessment to give an accurate price, but our standard diagnostic fee is $75. We can have a technician come out as soon as this afternoon or tomorrow morning. Would you like to book a visit?
Thank you, Sarah! Yes, tomorrow morning works for me. Please book it.
You’re all set for tomorrow morning. Our technician will call you before arrival. If you have any questions, just reply here. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services!
